bibl.title: The Herakleopolite Nome. A Catalogue of the Toponyms, with Introduction and Commentary.
bibl.note: 1 carte dépl. (75,5 cm x 51,5) sous pochette.

Part One. Introduction (1. In insula Nili; - 2. Toparchies and Pagi; - 3. Documents mentioning Herakleopolite Toponyms: Time-distribution, Provenance and Contents). - Part Two. The Toponyms of the Herakleopolite Nome. - Indexes.
bibl.seg: FALIVENE Maria Rosaria, The Herakleopolite Nome. A Catalogue of the Toponyms, with Introduction and Commentary. (American Studies in Papyrology. 37.)
Atlanta, Georgia, Scholars Press, 1998, 4°, xvii-324 pp., 1 carte dépl. (75,5 cm x 51,5) sous pochette. ISBN 0-7885-0412-6. $59.95.

Part One. Introduction (1. In insula Nili; - 2. Toparchies and Pagi; - 3. Documents mentioning Herakleopolite Toponyms: Time-distribution, Provenance and Contents). - Part Two. The Toponyms of the Herakleopolite Nome. - Indexes.

C.R. par William Brashear, Enchoria 25 (1999) pp. 187-191. - Marie Drew-Bear, ChrEg 75 (2000) No. 149, pp. 194-197. - Nikolaos Gonis, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2001/2001-02-13.html >. - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 45 (1999) pp. 205-206.
